divs: Sighting Details*I caught sight of the object while driving home from New windsor, N.Y. to Newburgh. Very bright and looked to have blue strings of light forming a cone at the top and bottom of craft. It was bumper to bumper on 17K wich runs the length of Stewart. you could see other plains in and around area as well as stars. hovered about 800ft. above airport. stopped at friends house to show them what was going on. My friend has farm 1 mile from airport. her a nd husband also witnessed and tokk pictures of event. object was seen for about an hour. i was totally excited at what we were seeing. i am a disabled air force veteran and live 2miles from airport. have seen craft over airport before.. Pine Bush N Y is only 10 miles from my house, wich is world known for there sightings for which i have seen up to 12 ships at once.
Summary: Seen object over Stewart International Airport. Just hovering.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Newburgh
There were no other sightings in Newburgh on or around December 17th 2008
